keyword: calories in a teaspoon peanut butter
title: Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in a teaspoon peanut butter, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fats, carbs, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter; unsalted, no added sugars or oils; â‰ˆ5 g per teaspoon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (natural vs. processed), additives, and measurement accuracy. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A teaspoon of peanut butter provides ~32 kcal and ~1.3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Commercial brand with added sugar and salt

faqs.q: How many calories in a teaspoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: About 32 kcal for natural, smooth peanut butter.

faqs.q: Is peanut butter high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~2.8 g total fat per teaspoon, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a teaspoon peanut butter?
Does peanut butter have carbs or fiber?
faqs.a: Low carbs (~1.2 g) and some fiber (~0.4 g) per teaspoon.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in peanut butter?
faqs.a: Natural brands are lower; sweetened ones add 5-10 kcal per teaspoon from sugars.
